safetyTips: Our delivery team are taking every precaution they possibly can to ensure the safety of our customers. That includes using appropriate PPE and maintaining a safe distance when making deliveries.
name: Hofmeister Brewing Company
description: Hofmeister Helles is an authentic imported Bavarian lager. Made using just mineral water, barley and hops, Hofmeister beer is lagered slower at zero degrees, for a fresh, crisp, Helles lager. Being local, we're opening up free delivery of our cases of 24 x 330ml bottles to customers in Reigate and within a 15 mile radius. Each case is Â£39.99 delivered to your door - simply email or call the team to order and we'll do the rest.
